definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.
sentences.chinese: 委员会认定在休闲胜地的裸体行为弊大于利。

sentences.english: It is one of the best summer resorts in China.
sentences.chinese: 它是中国最理想的避暑胜地之一。

sentences.english: They have vulgarized many of the loveliest spots in our country.
sentences.chinese: 他们把我国许多最美的旅游胜地弄得庸俗不堪。

sentences.english: The island is noted for its summer resort.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛以避暑胜地而著称。

sentences.english: In summer, Longqing Gorge is a summer resort in Beijing suburb.
sentences.chinese: 龙庆峡夏季是京郊避暑胜地。

sentences.english: Visit Mount Washington Alpine Resort for details.
sentences.chinese: 为细节访问山华盛顿高山的胜地。

sentences.english: The two coasts in the north have the advantages of being popular for surfing and eco-tours.
sentences.chinese: 北部的两个海岸拥有冲浪胜地及生态之旅的活动优势。

sentences.english: Unique and decadent, The Seagate Hotel & Spa is a luxury Delray Beach resort.
sentences.chinese: 独特的希捷酒店是一家豪华德尔雷海滩度假胜地。

sentences.english: This place has become a famous summer resort.
sentences.chinese: 这个地方已成为一个避暑胜地。

sentences.english: Fourth, I will pay a visit to some tourist attractions to widen my horizon.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我还要参观一些游览胜地，开阔眼界。

sentences.english: In ancient times, everyone is already Yong Nam toured the famous summer resort destination.
sentences.chinese: 在古代，青秀山已经是邕南著名的避暑游览胜地。

sentences.english: It is famous as a hotspring resort.
sentences.chinese: 这地方作为温泉胜地而著名。

sentences.english: There are also horse-driven carriages, especially in Chinatown and other touristy places.
sentences.chinese: 除此以外还有马车，特别是在唐人街和其他旅游胜地。

sentences.english: Here are lovers in hand with the travel destination.
sentences.chinese: 这里更是情侣们牵手同游的胜地。

sentences.english: Do you know any places of renown around here?
sentences.chinese: 你知道这儿有什么名胜地吗？

sentences.english: Among seaside resorts, I still think Exmouth is tops.
sentences.chinese: 在海滨胜地之中，我仍然认为埃克斯茅斯弯是最好的。

definition: holy land (of a religion)/sacred place/shrine/holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc)/center of historic interest
a place famous for its scenery or historical relics/scenic spot/CL:處|处[chu4]
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
famous mountain/Mingshan county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
to be famous far and wide (idiom)
